name: C4D Youtube
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
• Create Youtube slider from Youtube playlist.

  • Open video in modal box.

This plugin is used in C4D Vision – Responsive WooCommerce Theme

You can view here http://coffee4dev.com/responsive-woocommerce-theme-c4d-vision/

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘c4d youtube’
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download C4D Logo Carousel.
  2. Upload the ‘c4d-youtube directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.

Shortcode

[c4d-youtube api-key=”AIzaSyB2s_R4iadHFE-fcGGpfH-5EGYzTy8Xiqw” data-id=”playlist id”]
